name: Just do it or they'll die!
name_original: Just do it or they'll die!
description:
Game is about a psychopath who kidnaps your family and he orders you to do something for him. If you do that, he will set your family free.

Game is about taking choices and relying on luck. Each choice you make gives you different probability of success so you must decide which option is better.

In our game we have 3 quests and the game chooses one of them randomly at the beginning. If you win or lose, you can play again with a different quest. The quests are: killing the mayor, car theft or bank robbery.

Not the entire game depends on luck - there are some arcade minigames like connecting cables in a car or shooting a mayor.

Facebooku: https://www.facebook.com/TheSpookyKidsGames?fref=ts
